text: Waited 40 min for pickup; staff seemed overwhelmed and uninterested in helping.
Quick service and super friendly at checkout! The food was amazing too.
Food was good but order notes were completely ignored. Disappointing.
App kept crashing, couldn't place order. Very frustrating experience.
Clean store, decent prices, but parking was a bit tight. Overall good.
Delivery was late and items were missing. Poor quality control.
Excellent service! The staff went above and beyond to help us.
Average experience. Food was okay but nothing special for the price.
Great atmosphere and good food. Would recommend for casual dining.
Terrible customer service. Waited 1 hour for cold food. Never again.
